translation.en: OH, MY! FUCK! LOOK WHO IT IS, MAN!
IS THAT HIM?
RIGHT THERE. RIGHT OVER THERE. IS THAT HIM?
PUT YOUR GUN AWAY! THERE´S PEOPLE EVERYWHERE! -PUT YOUR FUCKING GUN AWAY! -TAKING HIM OUT.
translation.ja: 銃はしまえ　人が見てるだろ

translation.en: PUT YOUR GUN DOWN, MAN. I´M SERIOUS.
YOU WANT TO GET ARRESTED?
YOU GUYS, LEAVE US ALONE.
LEAVE HIM THERE! WALK AWAY FROM THE DOG!
RELEASE THE DOG, ASSHOLE!
LEAVE US ALONE!
-RELEASE THE DOG! -PUT THE FUCKING DOG DOWN!
RELEASE HIM!
PUT THE FUCKING GUN DOWN! PUT IT DOWN!
translation.ja: 銃を下ろせ 銃を下ろせ　早くしろ

translation.en: PUT IT DOWN!
translation.ja: 銃を下ろせ　早くしろ

translation.en: -PUT THE FUCKING GUN DOWN! -PUT THE GUN DOWN!
MY NAME IS JULIAN.
translation.ja: ノバスコシア州ヴァン･アレン矯正施設 ノバスコシア州ヴァン･アレン矯正施設俺はジュリアン

translation.en: TODAY IS A SPECIAL DAY
translation.ja: ノバスコシア州ヴァン･アレン矯正施設 ノバスコシア州ヴァン･アレン矯正施設今日 ようやく釈放される

translation.en: BECAUSE I´M FINALLY GETTING OUT OF PRISON.
translation.ja: 今日 ようやく釈放される

translation.en: I´VE BEEN LOOKING FORWARD TO THIS DAY FOR THE PAST 18 MONTHS.
translation.ja: 18カ月間この日を待ちわびてた

translation.en: MY NAME´S RICKY, AND I´VE BEEN IN HERE FOR ABOUT 18 MONTHS NOW.
translation.ja: 俺はリッキー 今日 18カ月ぶりにシャバに出るよ

translation.en: I´M GETTING OUT TODAY, THANK FUCK.
translation.ja: 今日 18カ月ぶりにシャバに出るよ

translation.en: WELL, YOU GUYS ARE GONNA GET TO KNOW RICKY, I THINK.
translation.ja: リッキーにも取材するんだろ

translation.en: AND, UH, BECAUSE I KNOW YOU GUYS
translation.ja: リッキーにも取材するんだろ 密着したら面白そうだからってな

translation.en: WANT TO FOLLOW HIM AROUND, AS WELL, WHICH IS COOL.
translation.ja: 密着したら面白そうだからってな

translation.en: I TELL YOU ONE THING, TONIGHT I AM GETTING DRUNK AT JULIAN´S. AND IT´S GONNA BE AWESOME.
translation.ja: 今夜はジュリアンの家で酒盛りだ

translation.en: IF YOU GUYS WANT TO COME TAPE IT, THAT´S FINE, BUT WE ARE GONNA GET REALLY DRUNK. IT´S GONNA BE WICKED.
translation.ja: 来てもいいが醜態しか撮れないぞ

translation.en: HOPEFULLY THERE´LL BE A BIT OF DOPE AROUND, TOO.
translation.ja: マリフアナが映るかもな

translation.en: I´VE BEEN, LIKE, KIND OF LIKE A TEACHER TO HIM, I GUESS. AND I´M SICK OF TEACHING HIM.
translation.ja: リッキーの面倒はもう見てられねえ

translation.en: I´M GONNA GET OUT OF PRISON. I´M GONNA MOVE BACK TO THE TRAILER PARK.
translation.ja: トレーラー･パークに戻ったら

translation.en: I´M GONNA LIVE A GOOD, CLEAN LIFE. I´VE MATURED NOW. THINGS ARE GONNA BE TOTALLY DIFFERENT.
translation.ja: まともな暮らしをして人生を変えたい

translation.en: I DO BLAME RICKY. OF COURSE I DO. LIKE, EVERYBODY KNOWS THAT HE´S THE REASON WHY I WENT TO JAIL IN THE FIRST PLACE.
translation.ja: リッキーのせいでムショにブチ込まれたんだ

translation.en: YOU KNOW, RICKY DOESN´T THINK.
SO, YOU KNOW, I´M NOT GONNA HANG OUT WITH HIM ANYMORE.
translation.ja: これ以上 関わる気はない

translation.en: I´M JUST GONNA LOOK OUT FOR NUMBER ONE, WHICH IS ME.
NO MORE RICKY.
JULIAN CAN FRIG OFF IF THAT´S WHAT HE´S TELLING YOU ´CAUSE IT´S NOT MY FAULT. IT´S JULIAN´S FAULT WE WENT TO JAIL.
translation.ja: 俺のせいじゃねえジュリアンが悪いんだ

translation.en: HE´S THE ONE FORCE-FEEDING ME DRUGS AND EVERY OTHER GODDAMN THING. IT´S NOT MY FAULT.
translation.ja: クスリから何から全部 あいつに教わった

translation.en: SO, YOU KNOW, IF THAT´S WHAT HE SAYS, THAT´S FINE. IT DOESN´T MATTER ANYWAY, BECAUSE THE COUNSELORS TOLD ME IT´S SOCIETY´S FAULT, NOT MY FAULT.
translation.ja: 弁護士も 悪いのは俺じゃなく社会だと言ってた

translation.en: AND IF JULIAN´S GONNA BE LIKE THAT, THEN FINE. I´M GONNA BLAME IT ON HIM, ´CAUSE IT´S HIS FAULT HE WENT TO JAIL THREE TIMES.
translation.ja: ３回もムショに入ったのはジュリアンのせいだ

translation.en: I DON´T NEED JULIAN ANYMORE.
RIGHT ON, MAN. I THOUGHT YOU LEFT.
NO, NO, NO, RICKY, GET YOUR OWN CAB.
WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?
YOU´RE GETTING YOUR OWN CAB. YOU´RE NOT SHARING MY CAB. GET OUT OF HERE.
WE´RE JUST GOING BACK TO THE TRAILER PARK!
YOU GOT ANY MONEY?
-NO, THAT´S WHY I NEED A RIDE. -WELL, GET YOUR OWN CAB.
translation.ja: ないから… 自分で帰れ

translation.en: THAT´S THE WAY YOU WANT TO TREAT ME, IS IT, ON-CAMERA? ON TV? HERE´S YOUR BAG.
translation.ja: カメラの前でその態度か？

translation.en: DON´T THROW MY SHIT.
COULD YOU GUYS TURN THAT OFF?
IF YOU´VE EVER BEEN IN JAIL BEFORE, THERE´S NOTHING BETTER THAN GETTING OUT OF JAIL AND COMING HOME.
translation.ja: ようやく家に帰れると思うと最高の気分だよ

translation.en: GEE, SHE´S GOTTEN BIGGER.
RICKY AND JULIAN?
translation.ja: リッキーとジュリアン？ レイヒートレーラー･パーク管理人

translation.en: WELL, FOR THE MOST PART, THEY´RE RESPONSIBLE
translation.ja: レイヒートレーラー･パーク管理人２人のせいでここの治安が悪化した

translation.en: FOR RUINING THIS TRAILER PARK.
translation.ja: レイヒートレーラー･パーク管理人２人のせいでここの治安が悪化した ２人のせいでここの治安が悪化した

translation.en: USED TO BE PEACEFUL AND QUIET HERE.
translation.ja: 昔は のどかで平和だったのに

translation.en: YOU KNOW, WHAT GETS ME MOST IS, ALL THE YOUNG KIDS LOOK UP TO THEM.
translation.ja: 若者たちは２人に憧れてる

translation.en: I MEAN, I GOT KIDS FLYING AROUND HERE THROWING BOTTLES AT PEOPLE,
translation.ja: それで人に瓶を投げたり

translation.en: GROWING DOPE, SQUEALING TIRES, JUMPING MOTORCYCLES OVER TRAILERS. THE LIST GOES ON.
translation.ja: マリフアナを栽培したり車やバイクで暴走したりする

translation.en: AND I´VE BEEN PARK SUPERVISOR HERE FOR GOING ON 16 YEARS. I´VE SEEN IT ALL, BUT THOSE TWO,
translation.ja: 16年間 管理人をしてるが２人には手を焼くよ

translation.en: PARTICULARLY RICKY, THEY´RE THE WORST.
translation.ja: 特にリッキーは悪質だ

translation.en: GIVE ME YOUR SMOKES, GORDON. GIVE ME YOUR FRIGGIN´ SMOKES.
translation.ja: おい タバコをよこせ

translation.en: YOU OWE ME 15 BUCKS, MAN! COME ON, I KNOW YOU´VE GOT SOME SMOKES HERE SOMEWHERE.
OKAY, RICKY, LET HIM UP!
-RICKY, OFF! -COME ON.
GET OFF HIM, MAN! LET GO OF HIS FOOT.
translation.ja: おい 離れるんだ 手を離せ

translation.en: -GIVE ME YOUR SMOKES, MAN! -LET HIM GO, RICKY!
GET OUT OF HERE. RICKY!
translation.ja: やめろ リッキー お前…

translation.en: -FRIG OFF, RANDY! -RANDY, BACK OFF.
translation.ja: リッキー お前… ランディ よせ

translation.en: -YOU FRIG OFF! -BACK OFF! STAY CLEAR!
translation.ja: ランディ よせ 離れろ　ムショに戻るか？

translation.en: WHAT WAS IT LIKE IN JAIL, HEY, BUDDY?
translation.ja: 離れろ　ムショに戻るか？

translation.en: WHERE´S JULIAN, RICKY?
WHERE ARE YOU STAYING, RICK?
AT THE FUCK-OFF HOTEL, LAHEY.
HAVE SOME RESPECT HERE. MR. LAHEY´S THE PARK SUPERVISOR.
translation.ja: 管理人を呼び捨てにするな

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU, HIS NEW ASSISTANT?
YES, I AM!
translation.ja: そうだ そうだランディ管理人助手

translation.en: WELL, THAT´S PRETTY FUCKED UP!
translation.ja: ランディ管理人助手 ランディ管理人助手そりゃ大変だ

translation.en: -THIS IS RICKY´S GIRL. -I MISSED YOU.
translation.ja: リッキーの娘だ リッキーの娘だトリニティ

translation.en: I MISSED YOU, TOO.
translation.ja: トリニティ トリニティ会いたかった

translation.en: IS RICKY OUT OF JAIL, TOO?
translation.ja: リッキーも釈放された？

translation.en: YEAH.
ARE YOU GONNA COME AND VISIT MY MOMMY?
UH, I DON´T KNOW. MAYBE.
YOU´RE OUT OF JAIL. YOU´VE GOT NO PLACE TO LIVE?
I GOT PLENTY OF PLACES TO LIVE. I COULD STAY AT ANY ONE OF THESE TRAILERS
translation.ja: 頼めば誰かが泊めてくれるさ

translation.en: ´CAUSE PEOPLE HERE LIKE ME, NOT LIKE YOU DICKS, ALL RIGHT?
translation.ja: 頼めば誰かが泊めてくれるさ 俺は人気者だからな

translation.en: THINGS HAVE CHANGED, RICK.
THINGS HAVE CHANGED, HAVE THEY?
YEAH, YOU´RE GONNA HAVE TO KEEP YOUR NOSE CLEAN, RICKY.
SMOKES -- LET´S GO. GIVE ME SOME SMOKES.
I´VE ONLY GOT TWO LEFT. I´M NOT GIVING YOU ANY.
YOU´RE A FUCKING DICK.
AND, LAHEY, YOU CAN GO FUCK YOURSELF, OKAY? STAY OUT OF MY BUSINESS.
translation.ja: 俺のことは ほっといてくれ

translation.en: WHAT A FREAKING JERK, MAN.
RICKY´S BACK.
NICE. THIS IS WHERE I LIVE.
YOU KNOW, LEAVE THIS PLACE FOR 18 MONTHS
translation.ja: ここが俺の家だ コーリーとトレバーに留守を任せたのに…

translation.en: AND LET CORY AND TREVOR STAY HERE, AND LOOK WHAT THEY DO.
translation.ja: コーリーとトレバーに留守を任せたのに…

translation.en: WHEN JULIAN GETS BACK, IT´S GONNA BE SO COOL.
translation.ja: ジュリアンが戻ればまた みんなで騒げる ジュリアンが戻ればまた みんなで騒げるトレバーコーリー

translation.en: THE WHOLE CREW´S GONNA HANG OUT AGAIN.
translation.ja: ジュリアンが戻ればまた みんなで騒げるトレバーコーリー

translation.en: WE´RE GONNA ROCK THE TRAILER PARK LIKE WE USED TO,
translation.ja: ジュリアンが戻ればまた みんなで騒げる

translation.en: SO WE´RE GONNA CLEAN THE PLACE UP. IT´S A LITTLE BIT -- IT´S A LITTLE MESSY NOW AND EVERYTHING,
translation.ja: 今日は散らかった家の片づけだ

translation.en: BUT WE´VE GOT LOTS OF TIME TO CLEAN IT UP. WE´LL HAVE IT LOOKING AS GOOD AS IT WAS WHEN HE LEFT.
translation.ja: 時間をかけてキレイにするよ

translation.en: WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED TO MY TRAILER, BOYS?
OKAY, CHILL. THERE´S THIS GUY NAMED CYRUS.
translation.ja: 落ち着いて サイラスってヤツが住み着いてさ

translation.en: HE JUST MOVED IN HERE.
translation.ja: サイラスってヤツが住み着いてさ

translation.en: THERE´S NOTHING WE COULD DO ABOUT IT. HE HAS A GUN AND HE´S NUTS.
translation.ja: 銃を持ってるから逆らえない

translation.en: YEAH, I MOVED INTO HIS TRAILER.
translation.ja: 確かに住んでる居心地がよくてな 確かに住んでる居心地がよくてなサイラス

translation.en: NICE LITTLE SPOT.
translation.ja: 確かに住んでる居心地がよくてなサイラス 確かに住んでる居心地がよくてな

translation.en: THE WAY I SEE IT, THIS FUCKING JULIAN GUY, HE LOST HIS PRIVILEGES WHEN HE WENT OFF TO CON COLLEGE.
translation.ja: ジュリアンとかいう野郎はムショに行っていなかった

translation.en: YOU SEE, I´M THE GUY THAT OWNS THE TRAILER NOW.
translation.ja: ジュリアンとかいう野郎はムショに行っていなかった 今は俺が家主だ

translation.en: I´M RUNNING THE TRAILER PARK.
translation.ja: パークを仕切るのも俺

translation.en: AND IF THAT BIG, TOUGH, FUCKING GUY COMES RUNNING AROUND HERE THROWING HIS LITTLE BIT OF WEIGHT AROUND,
translation.ja: デカいツラしてうろついてんじゃねえぞ

translation.en: WELL, THEN FUCK OFF!
translation.ja: デカいツラしてうろついてんじゃねえぞ 失(う)せろ

translation.en: WE´LL HELP YOU FIND A NEW PLACE TO LIVE, JULIAN.
THIS IS MY PLACE, YOU IDIOT!
I´M DISAPPOINTED IN YOU GUYS.
GONE FOR 18 MONTHS -- YOU KNEW I WAS GONNA BE HOME TODAY.
translation.ja: 帰宅したら このザマだ

translation.en: SHIT HAPPENS. THIS TIME IT´S NOT OUR FAULT.
SHUT UP!
YOU GUYS LET ME DOWN.
YEAH, MAN, BUT CYRUS, LIKE, HE KILLED A KID WHEN HE WAS IN REFORM SCHOOL AND SHIT.
translation.ja: サイラスは少年院で人を殺したんだぜ

translation.en: AND HE WAS, LIKE -- GOT EVEN HARDER WHEN HE WAS THERE, AND HE STOLE CARS, AND HE HAS A 9 MILLIMETER.
translation.ja: 車は盗むし銃を持ち歩いて危ない野郎だ

translation.en: AND LAHEY´S AFRAID TO DO ANYTHING ´CAUSE HE´S WORRIED ABOUT GETTING KNOCKED OUT BY HIM, TOO.
translation.ja: レイヒーも仕返しを恐れて何もしない

translation.en: IT´S LIKE HE´S THE NEW PARK KING OR SOMETHING, MAN.
translation.ja: 今はサイラスがキングだ

translation.en: SHIT CHANGES, MAN.
-HE´S NOT EVEN FROM THE PARK. -YEAH, MAN. HE´S FRONTING TO BE FROM THE PARK, ´CAUSE HE THINKS IT´S COOL TO LIVE IN A TRAILER PARK.
translation.ja: あいつは よそ者のくせにここに馴染んでやがる

translation.en: SO WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO?
I DON´T KNOW.
BUT I KNOW WHAT YOU GUYS ARE GONNA DO. YOU´RE GONNA START CLEANING UP THIS MESS.
translation.ja: だが お前たちは掃除しろ

translation.en: NOW!
I DON´T THINK WE GOT ANY CLEANERS.
CLEAN IT UP!
WHAT ARE YOU GUYS TAPING IN HERE?
translation.ja: 〝コンビニ〞 〝コンビニ〞 撮影なら許可を取って

translation.en: YOU HAVE TO HAVE PERMISSION.
translation.ja: 撮影なら許可を取って

translation.en: A FRIEND OF MINE´S DOING A DOCUMENTARY. DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT.
translation.ja: ダチのドキュメンタリーだ

translation.en: -ALL RIGHT. -WHAT?
LOOK, I NEED SOME STUFF, AND I COULD ROB YOU OR YOU COULD JUST GIVE IT TO ME -- IT´S UP TO YOURSELF, SO...
translation.ja: 盗まれたくなきゃタダでよこせ

translation.en: -YOU´RE RICKY, RIGHT? -YEAH, MAN.
translation.ja: リッキーか？ そうだ

translation.en: YOU CAN HAVE WHATEVER YOU WANT. I DON´T CARE.
OH, RIGHT ON. GIVE ME FOUR PACKS OF SMOKES.
translation.ja: 好きな物を持ってけ タバコ４箱に この花も

translation.en: AND I´LL TAKE THESE FLOWERS HERE.
translation.ja: タバコ４箱に この花も

translation.en: SMOKES! GRAB MY SMOKES THERE.
UH, I WAS IN -- I WAS HERE FIRST, THERE, BUD.
WHAT´S THAT CAMERA DOING HERE?
NONE OF YOUR FUCKING BUSINESS, ACTUALLY.
OBVIOUSLY YOU DON´T KNOW WHO THE FUCK I AM.
-OBVIOUSLY YOU DON´T KNOW -- -THE NAME IS CYRUS. CYRUS.
translation.ja: サイラス サイラスだ　分かったか

translation.en: AND I DON´T GIVE A FUCK WHO YOU ARE.
translation.ja: サイラスだ　分かったか

translation.en: BETTER CHILL OUT THERE, HEAVY METAL DICK.
translation.ja: 落ち着け メタル野郎

translation.en: YEAH? WELL, YOU GO BACK TO THE BOWLING ALLEY YOU CAME FROM, HELMET HEAD.
translation.ja: お前はボウリング場に戻れ

translation.en: YOU´RE FUCKING LUCKY I´M ON PROBATION!
-IS THAT RIGHT? -YEAH. SEE YA!
translation.ja: そうかよ　じゃあな

translation.en: THAT´S IT. BYE-BYE!
THAT´LL BE -- WAIT, CYRUS, YOU DIDN´T PAY.
FUCK OFF!
I´M J-ROC, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
translation.ja: 俺はＪ-ロック分かるだろ？

translation.en: "J" TO THE R-O-C UP IN THIS.
translation.ja: 俺はＪ-ロック分かるだろ？Ｊ-ロックタイロン

translation.en: -THIS HERE´S MY BOY "T," TYRONE. -WHAT´S UP, NOW?
translation.ja: Ｊ-ロックタイロン Ｊ-ロックタイロンこっちは相棒のタイロン こっちは相棒のタイロン

translation.en: -THIS HERE´S MR. GREEN. -WHAT´S UP? AND THAT´S HYDRO IN THE BACK.
translation.ja: Ｍｒ.グリーンにあいつはハイドロ

translation.en: DOUBLE CHEESE, NO BACON.
FOR REAL, FOR REAL.
HEY, WHAT´S UP?
-WHAT´S UP, MAN? -HEY, MAN.
HOW ARE YOU DOING, TYRONE?
-GOOD TO SEE YOU, MAN. -GOOD TO SEE YOU, MAN.
WELCOME BACK.
WHAT´S GOING ON, MAN?
NOT MUCH, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING.
DOING ALL RIGHT. IT´S ALL GOOD.
SO HOW ARE THINGS GOING?
WHAT´S WRONG?
ME AND "T" GOT SOME BAD NEWS, "G."
YO, CYRUS, MAN.
HE ALL UP IN THIS PARK CONTROLLING ALL THE LIQUOR,
translation.ja: 酒もマリフアナもあいつが仕切ってる

translation.en: SELLING ALL THE DOPE, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
translation.ja: 酒もマリフアナもあいつが仕切ってる 分かるだろ？銃があるから強気だ

translation.en: GOT A GUN, RUNNING AROUND ACTING HARD WITH EVERYBODY.
translation.ja: 分かるだろ？銃があるから強気だ

translation.en: YOU´RE NOT THE KING OF THE PARK ANYMORE.
BOYS, LISTEN UP, ALL RIGHT? I´M OUT OF JAIL NOW.
THIS IS MY TRAILER. THIS IS MY HOME.
translation.ja: このトレーラーは俺の家だ

translation.en: I´M NOT WORRIED ABOUT CYRUS, ALL RIGHT? DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT.
translation.ja: サイラスが何だ　心配するな

translation.en: -COME ON! -A´IGHT. SO WHAT´S GOING ON?
translation.ja: ほら 元気だったんだろ？

translation.en: WE DOIN´ ALL RIGHT.
WE BE DOPE WHEN THE NEW N.W.A. COME OUT, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
I HAVEN´T SEEN LUCY AND TRINITY SINCE TRINITY´S 7th BIRTHDAY.
translation.ja: 娘とは７歳の誕生日以来だ

translation.en: NO, IT WAS HER 8th BIRTHDAY.
NO, NO, IT WAS HER 7th BIRTHDAY, I THINK.
BUT ANYWAY, I WAS IN JAIL FOR HER 7th OR 8th BIRTHDAY,
translation.ja: 娘の誕生日にムショ送りさ

translation.en: AND, YOU KNOW, THEY NEVER REALLY GOT A CHANCE TO COME VISIT ME IN JAIL.
translation.ja: 面会には一度も来てくれなかった

translation.en: A YEAR AND A HALF IS QUITE A LONG TIME TO GO WITHOUT SEEING YOUR DAUGHTER
translation.ja: １年半もの間娘に会えなかったんだ

translation.en: OR THE WOMAN YOU LOVE, FOR THAT MATTER, I GUESS.
RIGHT ON, BOYS! BUBBLES!
HOW ARE YOU DOING, BUDDY?
translation.ja: 久しぶり元気だったか？

translation.en: -IT´S JULIAN. -GOOD TO SEE YOU, MAN.
translation.ja: 久しぶり元気だったか？ 久しぶり元気だったか？バブルズ

translation.en: THAT´S MY BEST FRIEND JULIAN.
translation.ja: バブルズ バブルズおかえり おかえり

translation.en: WHAT´S UP?
WHAT ARE YOU DOING? HOME FROM JAIL?
translation.ja: お前は？ 帰ってきた

translation.en: YEAH, GOT OUT TODAY.
WHO´S THIS GUY? WHAT AM I ON THE TV FOR?
I´M JUST DOING A LITTLE DOCUMENTARY THING, YOU KNOW.
HOW ARE YOU DOING?
SO WHAT´S GOING ON, ANYWAY?
WELL, I DON´T KNOW IF YOU WERE IN THERE YET,
BUT SOME DICKHEAD MOVED INTO YOUR TRAILER. I TRIED TO STOP HIM, BUT I COULDN´T.
translation.ja: よそ者を追い出せなかった

translation.en: YEAH, CYRUS.
HE KEEPS STICKING A FUCKING GUN IN MY FACE.
SEE THIS? ALL RIGHT?
OLD MAN GAVE ME THAT WHEN I WAS IN GRADE 7.
translation.ja: ガキの頃 親父(おやじ)にもらった

translation.en: SEEN A LOT OF ACTION.
translation.ja: 使い込んでるよ　９ミリだ

translation.en: 9 MILLIMETER, SAFETY ALWAYS OFF.
translation.ja: 使い込んでるよ　９ミリだ 安全装置は常にオフ

translation.en: TOLD ME HE WAS PROUD OF ME ONCE.
FUCKING PRICK.
CORY AND TREVOR LET HIM MOVE RIGHT IN.
YEAH?
YOU CAN MOVE IN HERE WITH ME IF YOU WANT.
NO, THAT´S ALL RIGHT. THAT´S, YOU KNOW -- I´M GONNA TAKE CARE OF CYRUS, BUT, YOU KNOW --
translation.ja: いいんだサイラスと決着をつける

translation.en: I THINK YOU SHOULD.
WHAT DO YOU THINK I SHOULD DO?
WELL, I´LL TELL YOU RIGHT NOW. I TALKED TO HIM ALREADY A COUPLE OF TIMES, AND HE´S FUCKING SCARED OF YOU. HE´S WAITING, WONDERING WHEN YOU´RE COMING HOME.
translation.ja: サイラスはお前を怖がってるいつ帰るか気にしてたよ

translation.en: -YEAH? -YEP.
SO ALL I´VE GOT TO DO IS TELL HIM YOU´RE HERE, AND I BET YOU HE FUCKING BOLTS.
translation.ja: お前が戻ったと知れば逃げ出すさ

translation.en: I DON´T KNOW IF IT´S GONNA BE THAT EASY,
BUT, YOU KNOW, I JUST GOT TO WATCH IT, MAN. I´M ON PROBATION, AND, YOU KNOW, I´M NOT GOING BACK TO JAIL.
translation.ja: 仮釈放中だから無茶したくないんだ

translation.en: YOU WON´T HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT THAT. YEAH? EVERYBODY IN THE FUCKING PARK HATES HIM.
translation.ja: 心配ない　ヤツは嫌われ者だ

translation.en: LAHEY, EVERYBODY. NOBODY FUCKING LIKES HIM. HE FUCKS EVERYONE OVER.
translation.ja: レイヒーもみんなもまいってる

translation.en: ALL RIGHT.
-COCKSUCKER. -WELL, MAYBE... YOU KNOW, IF YOU COULD GET WORD AROUND THE PARK
translation.ja: だったらみんなを集めてくれないか

translation.en: AND, YOU KNOW, TELL EVERYONE I´M THROWING HIM OUT TONIGHT.
translation.ja: 今夜 ヤツを追い出す

translation.en: -YEAH, I CAN DO THAT. -YEAH? -DON´T YOU WORRY ABOUT THAT. -ALL RIGHT.
I´LL GO AROUND DOOR TO FUCKING DOOR IF I HAVE TO.
ENOUGH OF THAT STUFF, MAN. IT´S JUST GOOD TO SEE YOU.
translation.ja: とにかく会えてよかった

translation.en: I HEAR YOU´RE RICKY, JULIAN´S LITTLE JAIL BUDDY.
translation.ja: ジュリアンの子分のリッキー？

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU FILMING, MORE EPISODES OF "HAPPY DAYS" THERE, FONZIE?
translation.ja: カメラの前で役者気取りか？

translation.en: LISTEN, JUST GIVE ME YOUR FUCKING SMOKES.
BUDDY, I JUST GOT OUT OF JAIL, ALL RIGHT? I DON´T WANT ANY TROUBLE. PUT THE GUN AWAY.
I MEAN, YOU´RE ON-CAMERA WITH A FUCKING GUN.
I DON´T GIVE A FUCK ABOUT THE CAMERA CREW, OKAY?
JUST GIVE ME YOUR FUCKING SMOKES OR I´LL PUT A BULLET RIGHT THROUGH YOUR GODDAMN RIB CAGE.
translation.ja: タバコをよこさないと撃つぞ

translation.en: FOR FUCK´S SAKES!
I´VE GOT FOUR PACKS OF SMOKES, ALL RIGHT?
YOU CAN HAVE TWO OF THEM, ALL RIGHT?
NO, FUCKING THANKS.
IF YOU´RE GONNA SHOOT ME OVER TWO PACKS OF SMOKES, THEN GO AHEAD -- SHOOT ME.
translation.ja: 全部欲しいなら 撃てよ

translation.en: IT´S YOUR LUCKY FUCKING DAY, THEN, ISN´T IT, JAIL BOY?
YOU TELL YOUR FRIEND JULIAN TO GET THE FUCK OUT OF THE TRAILER PARK, OR HE´LL HAVE CYRUS AND YOU KNOW WHAT TO DEAL WITH.
translation.ja: ジュリアンに伝えろ出てかなきゃ俺が相手だと

translation.en: FUCK OFF SOMEWHERE. I´VE GOT WORK TO DO.
translation.ja: 消えろ　俺は忙しい

translation.en: I DON´T EVEN HANG AROUND WITH JULIAN ANYMORE.
WHAT THE FUCK DO YOU THINK YOU´RE DOING?
translation.ja: 何してるのこのカメラは？

translation.en: -WHAT´S THIS? -I´VE COME TO TALK TO LUCY.
translation.ja: 何してるのこのカメラは？サラ サラ

translation.en: DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT. IT´S SOMETHING JULIAN´S DOING.
translation.ja: サラジュリアンの連れだ ジュリアンの連れだ

translation.en: WHAT THAT JULIAN´S DOING?
SARA, IT DOESN´T MATTER. WHERE´S LUCY?
-LUCY´S NOT HERE. -I KNOW SHE´S HERE.
SHE WENT TO THE PARK OR SOMETHING. SHE´S NOT HERE.
SHE JUST SNUCK OUT THE BACK DOOR?
SHE DIDN´T SNEAK. SHE WALKED OUT THE FRONT DOOR WITH HER DAUGHTER
translation.ja: 娘を連れて玄関から出てったわ

translation.en: -TO GO TO THE PARK. -I´M NOT AN IDIOT.
-SARA, WHO´S AT THE DOOR? -NOBODY´S AT THE DOOR.
-LUCY, IT´S RICKY. -THAT´S NOT LUCY. CAN I TALK TO YOU FOR A MINUTE, PLEASE?
translation.ja: リッキーだ　話したい

translation.en: I DON´T WANT YOU TO COME IN, ESPECIALLY NOT WITH ALL THESE PEOPLE.
translation.ja: カメラを連れて入る気？

translation.en: -COME ON IN, GUYS. -I DON´T WANT YOU TO COME IN.
translation.ja: 行くぞ 入ってこないで

translation.en: -DON´T SHOVE ME, SARA. -YOU CAN´T JUST COME BACK HERE -AFTER 18 MONTHS... -DON´T SHOVE ME. ...AND EXPECT TO JUST WALK BACK IN THE HOUSE LIKE NOTHING HAPPENED, OKAY?
translation.ja: 何もなかったような顔で家に戻れると思う？

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU, HER FUCKING BODYGUARD?
I´M NOT HER BODYGUARD. I´M HER ROOMMATE.
I´M LIVING HERE, HELPING PAY THE BILLS SINCE YOUR ASS WAS IN JAIL.
translation.ja: ここに住んで家賃を払ってる

translation.en: WELL, NOW I´M BACK AND I´M GONNA BE PAYING THE BILLS AROUND HERE.
THAT´S WHAT YOU THINK!
HOLY SHIT, YOU LOOK GOOD.
I JUST THOUGHT IT WOULD BE NICE TO SPEND SOME TIME TOGETHER. I´VE BEEN IN JAIL FOR 18 MONTHS.
WELL, YEAH, OKAY.
I´M ONLY GONNA BE HERE TO SLEEP ANYWAY, SO DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT.
translation.ja: どこでだって寝られる

translation.en: YOU´RE KIDDING.
YOU ARE KIDDING, RIGHT?
WHAT DO YOU MEAN?
UH, LISTEN.
UH, CAN -- KEEP THAT CLOSED.
UM, TRINITY AND I CANNOT HAVE YOU COMING IN AND OUT OF OUR LIVES LIKE THIS.
translation.ja: 私と娘の生活に入り込むのはやめてほしいの

translation.en: SO JUST GO STAY WITH RAY.
THIS IS MY DAD´S PLACE. SOUNDS LIKE HE´S DRUNK AGAIN, SO...
translation.ja: 親父の家だ多分 酔ってるな

translation.en: I LEARNED FROM MY DAD THE BEST THING TO DO WHEN HE´S DRUNK IS TO STAY AWAY. I´D RATHER SLEEP IN THE PLAYGROUND TONIGHT.
translation.ja: こういう時は近づかない方が安全だ

translation.en: AS MUCH AS I WANT TO GET DRUNK, I´M NOT GOING IN THERE. THERE COULD BE WOMEN. GOD KNOWS WHAT´S GOING ON, SO...
translation.ja: 家の中に女がいたりしたら大変だ

translation.en: HAVE TO FIND SOMEWHERE ELSE TO GO, BOYS.
10-8. YOU GOT A 10-8 THERE?
translation.ja: 無線はつながってるか？

translation.en: 10-8? YOU GOT A 10-2?
Randy here. All systems clear.
10-4, RANDY.
YOU KNOW, I ORDINARILY DON´T LIKE TO DO THIS, BUT I GOT TO CALL THE COPS.
translation.ja: 普段はしないが今回は警察に連絡する

translation.en: THERE´S A POTENTIAL SHOOTOUT GONNA BE HAPPENING IN THE TRAILER PARK TONIGHT,
translation.ja: 今夜 パーク内で銃撃戦が発生するかも

translation.en: AND -- AND I´M GONNA CALL IN THE HEAVIES.
translation.ja: 今夜 パーク内で銃撃戦が発生するかも 通報するしかない

translation.en: YOU KNOW, THAT´S REALLY UNFAIR, MR. LAHEY.
translation.ja: 何も そこまでしなくても

translation.en: JULIAN´S ON PROBATION. HE COULD GO BACK TO JAIL FOR A REALLY LONG TIME.
translation.ja: ジュリアンは仮釈放中です

translation.en: YEAH, JULIAN´S ON PROBATION. CYRUS ISN´T. CYRUS WILL KILL ME.
translation.ja: ヤツは心配ないがサイラスは俺を殺すかも

translation.en: YOU GOT ANY BETTER IDEAS? IF NOT, PUT YOUR SHIRT ON AND SHUT UP.
translation.ja: 他に策がないなら口を出すな

translation.en: YOU KNOW, THERE´S A LOT OF DIFFERENT PERSONALITIES
translation.ja: ここにはいろんなヤツがいるが

translation.en: HERE IN THIS TRAILER PARK, AND EVERY SINGLE PERSON TRIES
translation.ja: ここにはいろんなヤツがいるが みんな互いを尊重し合ってる

translation.en: TO RESPECT EACH OTHER, EXCEPT FOR CYRUS.
translation.ja: みんな互いを尊重し合ってる だがサイラスはやりたい放題だ

translation.en: HE HAS NO RESPECT FOR ANYONE BUT HIMSELF.
translation.ja: だがサイラスはやりたい放題だ

translation.en: AND I DON´T REALLY WANT TO CALL THE POLICE IN HERE, AND CONVINCED MR. LAHEY NOT TO,
translation.ja: 個人的には警察は呼びたくない

translation.en: BECAUSE I FEEL THAT IN THIS COMMUNITY, WE SHOULD BE ABLE TO WORK THINGS OUT OURSELVES.
translation.ja: 地域のことは住民が解決すべきだ

translation.en: CYRUS AIN´T FROM THE PARK, YOU KNOW WHAT I MEAN?
translation.ja: サイラスは よそ者だ

translation.en: ´ROUND HERE, IT´S ALL FOR ALL AND ONE FOR ONE.
translation.ja: “１人は１人のために皆は皆のために”

translation.en: -THAT´S RIGHT. -YEAH, MAN.
MOTHERFUCKERS WHO AIN´T FROM THE PARK, THEY DON´T UNDERSTAND THE WAY SHIT GOES DOWN,
translation.ja: パークの掟(おきて)を分かってねえのさ

translation.en: LIKE THE "J" TO THE R-O-C AND LIKE TYRONE DOES, MY MAN HERE. -YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING. -YEAH.
translation.ja: 俺たちとは違うんだそうだろ？

translation.en: WHEN YOU´RE FROM THE PARK, IT´S ALL FOR ONE MOTHERFUCKER AND ONE MOTHERFUCKER FOR ALL MO´FUCKERS EVERYWHERE,
translation.ja: “お前は仲間のために仲間はお前のために”だ

translation.en: YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
BUT IF YOU COME FROM OUTSIDE THE PARK, YOU BETTER WATCH OUT, ´CAUSE YOU GOT A WHOLE BUNCH OF PARK HUSTLERS ON YOUR JOCK.
translation.ja: よそ者は気をつけねえと目をつけられるぞ

translation.en: THAT STICK TOGETHER, TOO. IT´S LIKE A FAMILY.
translation.ja: 家族みたいにカタいんだ

translation.en: WELL, YOUR JOCK DON´T STICK TOGETHER, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING, BUT THE PEOPLE STICK TOGETHER. THAT´S THE SHIT I´M TALKING ABOUT.
translation.ja: カタいのはアソコじゃねえぞ俺らの絆だ

translation.en: EVERY DAY MR. LAHEY AND I CLEAN UP THIS PLAYGROUND.
translation.ja: 毎日 公園の掃除をする

translation.en: RANDY, WE HAVE COMPANY.
OH, SHIT, IT´S CYRUS.
WHAT´S THIS -- DON´T YOU MOVE!
WHAT´S THIS I HEAR ABOUT YOU CALLING THE COPS, HUH?
WHAT´S THIS I HEAR ABOUT YOU CALLING THE COPS?
NOW, LISTEN, THERE´S PEOPLE WHO LIVE AROUND HERE.
translation.ja: わめくな　近所迷惑だ

translation.en: JUST TAKE IT EASY, WILL YOU, CYRUS?
I´LL FUCKING MAKE THE DECISIONS AROUND HERE. YOU GOT THAT, OLD MAN?
translation.ja: 勝手なマネするんじゃねえよ

translation.en: JUST BACK OFF, CYRUS.
TAKE YOUR HANDS OFF ME, SASQUATCH!
translation.ja: 触るな　毛むくじゃら

translation.en: NOW, LISTEN -- YOU LISTEN TO ME, OLD MAN.
YOU CALL THE COPS, AND I´LL MAKE AN EXAMPLE OF YOU.
translation.ja: サツを呼んだら見せしめにするぞ

translation.en: YOU UNDERSTAND ME?
WHAT´S THAT SUPPOSED TO MEAN, CYRUS?
BANG! DO I GOT TO SPELL IT FOR YOU?
NOW SAY YOU´RE SORRY.
I´M SORRY.
KISS MY HAND.
I´M NOT KISSING YOUR HAND.
KISS MY HAND.
DO IT.
ALL RIGHT, FUCK OFF. I´VE GOT WORK TO DO.
translation.ja: じゃあな　俺は忙しい

translation.en: REMEMBER WHAT I SAID.
OH, MY GOD.
ME AND JULIAN COULD DEFINITELY TAKE CARE OF THE CYRUS THING.
translation.ja: サイラスなんてチョロいさ

translation.en: IT´S JUST THAT, NUMBER ONE, WE´RE ON PROBATION,
translation.ja: サイラスなんてチョロいさ だが― 仮釈放中に厄介な騒ぎは起こしたくない

translation.en: WHICH IS NO BIG DEAL, BUT, YOU KNOW, I DON´T REALLY WANT TO GO BACK TO JAIL.
translation.ja: 仮釈放中に厄介な騒ぎは起こしたくない

translation.en: AND NUMBER TWO OR THREE OR WHATEVER NUMBER WE´RE ON,
I´M NOT GOING BACK TO JAIL FOR JULIAN BECAUSE I DON´T EVEN HANG AROUND WITH HIM ANYMORE.
translation.ja: ジュリアンと関わりたくない

translation.en: WE´VE GOT TO MAKE A FEW THINGS CLEAR.
SURE.
THE TWO OF US CAN´T LIVE IN THIS TRAILER PARK TOGETHER, NOW, CAN WE?
translation.ja: 俺たちは共存できない

translation.en: RIGHT, SO I GUESS SOMEONE´S GOT TO MOVE.
THAT´S WHAT I´M TALKING ABOUT.
HEY, THAT´S MY SHIT!
HEY, THAT´S MY SHIT! THAT´S MY SHIT!
translation.ja: やめろ　人の物に何する

translation.en: OBVIOUSLY YOU DIDN´T HEAR ME WHEN I SAID CLEAR OUT YOUR OWN SHIT.
translation.ja: 捨てるならお前の荷物にしろ

translation.en: NOW, I WANT A NEW TV.
translation.ja: テレビとビデオデッキ

translation.en: I WANT A VCR, AND I WANT MY PORN TAPES REPLACED
translation.ja: テレビとビデオデッキ ポルノビデオを返してくれ

translation.en: BECAUSE THOSE WERE THE CRÈME DE LA CRÈME.
translation.ja: ポルノビデオを返してくれ

translation.en: I WANT YOU OUT OF THIS PARK.
[ SCOFFS ] I´M NOT LEAVING.
I PROVIDE A SERVICE FOR THESE GOOD PEOPLE. THEY´RE LIKE MY FAMILY.
translation.ja: ここの住民は家族同然だ

translation.en: TELL HIM, PEOPLE. GO ON.
A SHOW OF HANDS, THOSE WHO NEED HIS DOPE.
translation.ja: マリフアナが欲しいヤツは？

translation.en: I´D LIKE TO TAKE THIS OPPORTUNITY TO LET EVERYBODY KNOW THAT ME AND TYRONE´S OPEN FOR BUSINESS. WE CAN SERVICE ALL YOUR DOPE NEEDS.
translation.ja: 今後は俺とタイロンがマリフアナを提供するぜ

translation.en: GOOD PRICES, TOO, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
SEE, WE DON´T NEED YOU HERE.
WELL, I´M NOT LEAVING. AND I´M NOT AFRAID TO USE THIS GUN.
translation.ja: 出ていくかよ　意地でもな

translation.en: I THINK YOU´RE AFRAID.
FUCK AFRAID! YOU THINK I WON´T PULL THE TRIGGER?
translation.ja: まさか俺には撃てないって？

translation.en: MY BRAIN TELLS MY FINGER TO PULL THE TRIGGER, AND BOOM! HAPPENS JUST LIKE THAT.
translation.ja: 俺の脳ミソがぶっ放せと言ってる

translation.en: WELL, LET ME TALK TO YOUR BRAIN, THEN. HEY, CYRUS´S BRAIN, PULL THE TRIGGER!
translation.ja: おい 脳ミソ引き金を引いてみろ

translation.en: OH, FUNNY GUY.
PULL THE TRIGGER! DO IT!
DO IT!
[ SCOFFS ] YOU´RE NOT GONNA DO IT, MAN.
CYRUS, YOU FUCKING DICK!
SHUT UP!
WHY DON´T YOU DO YOURSELF A FAVOR? YOU´RE NOT FROM THE PARK, MAN. YOU DON´T BELONG HERE.
translation.ja: いいか？ お前はよそ者だ

translation.en: THIS IS MY FAMILY. WHY DON´T YOU GET OUT OF HERE?
translation.ja: 彼らは俺の家族だ　出ていけ

translation.en: I DON´T NEED THIS SHIT ANYWAY. CHUMP CHANGE.
translation.ja: どうでもいい　クズどもめ

translation.en: THANKS FOR GETTING RID OF CYRUS FOR US, JULIAN.
translation.ja: 助かったよ ジュリアン

translation.en: NOW IF YOU COULD JUST HELP STRAIGHTEN RICKY OUT, WE´D BE ALL SET.
translation.ja: リッキーの更生も頼む

translation.en: ALL RIGHT, EVERYBODY, PARTY´S OVER. LET´S GO HOME.
translation.ja: パーティーは終わりだ解散しろ

translation.en: WELCOME BACK, JULIAN.
FUCK OFF, MR. LAHEY!
COME ON, RANDY. LET´S GO WRITE THIS UP.
translation.ja: ランディ 報告書を作るぞ

translation.en: ALL IN ALL, I THINK WE HAD A PRETTY GOOD DAY TODAY, GUYS. IT´S TIME TO HAVE A FEW DRINKS, SIT DOWN, TURN THAT THING OFF.
translation.ja: 今日はいろいろあったから酒でクールダウンだ

translation.en: MAN, I´M SORRY TO INTERRUPT YOUR TV SHOW.
I´VE GOT NOWHERE TO GO, JULIAN.
ME AND LUCY ARE ALL DONE, AND MY DAD´S DRUNK.
translation.ja: 女にも親父にも頼れない

translation.en: I WAS JUST WONDERING IF I COULD MAYBE SLEEP IN YOUR CAR OR SOMETHING, MAN. I GOT NOWHERE TO GO.
translation.ja: お前の車を貸してくれないか

translation.en: THANKS, JULIAN.
I CAN´T BELIEVE HE´S STILL OUT THERE.
FOR THE PAST 18 MONTHS, I PROMISED MYSELF TO STAY AWAY FROM HIM.
translation.ja: 今後は距離を置くと心に誓ったが

translation.en: I DON´T KNOW. HE´S A GOOD GUY.
translation.ja: なぜかヤツを憎めない

translation.en: TAKE IT EASY, JULIAN. I´M LEAVING.
-RELAX, RICKY, RELAX. -I JUST GOT NOWHERE TO GO.
translation.ja: いいんだ　休んでろ

translation.en: HERE, I GOT YOU SOME HOT DOGS.
translation.ja: ほら ホットドッグだ

translation.en: I GOT YOU SOME VODKA.
I APPRECIATE THIS, JULIAN, BUT, I MEAN, I DON´T NEED YOUR CHARITY.
RICKY, IT´S OKAY, ALL RIGHT?
translation.ja: リッキー いいんだ

translation.en: HERE, YOU CAN SLEEP IN THE CAR FOR TWO DAYS.
THANKS, BUDDY. I APPRECIATE THAT.
I WANT YOU OUT OF THAT CAR IN TWO DAYS, THOUGH, RICKY, ALL RIGHT?
NO MORE THAN TWO WEEKS. I PROMISE, ALL RIGHT?
